scenario: In 2024, Frank has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) (or contribution base) of $71,766.00. Frank makes a charitable contribution of $47,976.59 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(G)(i), the deduction is limited to 60% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2024.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 60% of AGI ($43,059.60). Since the contribution ($47,976.59) is compared to the limit, the allowable deduction is $43,059.60.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
